reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Robertson is an amazing professor! Her lectures are clear, and she really cares about her students. The coursework is challenging but very rewarding.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable, but sometimes his explanations can be hard to follow. However, he is always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Carter's classes are well-structured, but she can be a bit strict on deadlines. Her grading is fair, but the exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Davis knows his material, but he doesn't engage the class much. The lectures are monotonous, and it's easy to fall behind.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is disorganized, and her lectures are often confusing. The assignments are unclear, and it's hard to get help when you need it.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is a good storyteller and makes history come alive. The reading load is heavy, but it's worth it for the insights you gain.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. White is passionate about sociology and it shows. Her classes are interactive and thought-provoking. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Green is very smart, but sometimes his lectures are a bit dry. You’ll need to do a lot of reading on your own to fully grasp the material.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Black is very engaging and knowledgeable. The discussions in her class are always lively, but you need to stay on top of current events.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is an excellent professor who encourages deep thinking. His assignments are challenging, but you’ll come out of his class with a new perspective on life.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Miller is knowledgeable, but her lectures can be a bit unstructured. If you’re willing to put in the effort, you can learn a lot.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is a tough but fair professor. His classes are rigorous, but you’ll be well-prepared for your future career in engineering.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson has a deep passion for art history. Her lectures are inspiring, and the projects allow you to explore your own interests.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is well-read and his insights are valuable, but the reading load is intense. Be prepared to spend a lot of time on assignments.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Evans is dedicated to her field. Her classes are informative and the fieldwork is a great way to apply what you learn in class.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. King is an outstanding music professor. His classes are both fun and educational, and he really knows how to connect with his students.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Scott’s lectures are fascinating, and she brings a lot of real-world experience to the classroom. The exams are tough, but fair.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is very intelligent, but his teaching style is hard to follow. You’ll need to do a lot of studying on your own to keep up.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is an excellent marketing professor. Her classes are practical and engaging, and she provides a lot of real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is very knowledgeable and passionate about geology. His field trips are a highlight, but be prepared for some tough exams.
